Module uno_game
Package game_model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
game_model.Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
CPUPlayer
public class Player extends Object
The Player class represents a player in the game, managing the player's cards, turn status, and actions.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Player()
    Constructs a new Player object with an empty list of cards.
    Player(String player)
    Constructs a new Player object with a given name.
